author: USA TODAY, Daphne Duret (dduret@gatehousemedia.com), USA TODAY Network
title: Stranded by coronavirus: Their boarding schools closed, but some international students can't go home
description: An estimated 2,000 international students are stuck on U.S. boarding school campuses, even as classes have been canceled by the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
With the majority of schools closed for the year, students and their families try to create a home learning schedule that works for themselves.
USA TODAY
Between the endless hours Yifan Jin spent listening to Taylor Swift and watching science fiction movies… [+9442 chars]
